Reason: The configuration 'max_hint_window_in_ms' is performance-sensitive because it directly affects the hinting process for dead hosts, which can have a notable impact on system performance. The code snippet provided shows that the configuration is used to check if a hint window has expired for a dead host, and if it has, new hints will not be generated until the host has been seen alive and gone down again. This time-extensive operation can lead to significant performance variations at the system level, making the configuration performance-sensitive.
